resources.string: Check time info of when the event will happen

Set at what time you want the notifications to appear

beslimir is the creator of the app.
The app is made for fun and serves as a daily notifier with some dedicated quotes.

First notification will arrive on: %1$s
Last notification will arrive on: %2$s
With this statement, I confess that...
With this statement, I confess that FC Bayern beat Barcelona last night 3:0!

Click me to accept and read the statement!
